overview: Blood Moon centers on a bright-eyed artist named Betty who makes the unorthodor choice to build her own lover. Sculpted from a pumpkin and slathered with paint, Lenny is designed to be Betty's ideal man, made to fulfill her every desire. But Lenny has his own ideas.  With undercurrents of Greek mythology, science fiction, and film noir, Mary and Patrick explore the inevitable conflict between love and ego.
title: Blood Moon
